CustomField.inlineHelpText: Would you like us to locate your terminated employee(s)?
CustomField.label: FindEmployeesCertifiedNotices

value.fullName: Yes, I want Ubiquity to locate my ex-employee(s) for me ($25 look up fee per employee)
value.label: Yes, I want Ubiquity to locate my ex-employee(s) for me ($25 look up fee per employee)

value.fullName: No, I (sponsor/trustee) will locate their last known address and update the information online if applicable
value.label: No, I (sponsor/trustee) will locate their last known address and update the information online if applicable
